title: Got nothing from the Hexa chest
body: I opened my hexa chest that I got from the finishing the mission but nothing came out. The chest and the key disappeared and I tried everything; I re-logged, checked my loot, etc. Is riot going to compensate for this chest? They can check my account anytime to confirm that I didn't get anything from the chest.

replies.body: That chest ended up giving you the Vamporo emote! You should be able to find it in your emote collection ^_^!
